name: Royal Pains
description:
Hello! This is my submission for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam!

Control both characters in a mad dash towards escape!

Unfortunately, this turned out a lot shorter than I had initially anticipated, as I got hung up on mechanics for way too long. Being a new game developer and tackling everything solo is full of adventures. :D Anyways, I hope you enjoy my game!

Art used:

 https://opengameart.org/content/a-platformer-in-the-forest

https://ansimuz.itch.io/sunny-land-pixel-game-art

https://opengameart.org/content/platformer-tiles-4

Music Used: 

https://opengameart.org/content/5-chiptunes-action
